__e: I love that I now know that my life is not worth living without you.

If someone watching this is feeling like their life doesn't have worth, I hope that you see around Hannah in this show all the people who care about her, and know that there are those people in your life as well.
I don't know what three years of a man's life is worth but one thing I do know is that life itself ain't worth much without love.
Then you're of no won'th to me and I might as well shoot you now and leave.
Well, guess this guy is, uh, completely worthless to us, isn't he?
